preqs: LAW1100 or LAW1101 and LAW1102 or LAW1104; LAW3300 or  LAW3301 and LAW3302

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000567, 50000568}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {LAW1100, LAW1102, LAW1104, LAW3300, LAW3302}

description: Topics which form the core material include: the history of federal involvement in the criminal law; federal policing agencies; the sources and nature of federal criminal procedure; the relationship of federal criminal law to state criminal law and to state courts; and the sentencing structures for federal offenders. Additional emerging topics of federal interest may be added from year to year.
